languages.text: "Я впервые слышу, чтобы ты говорил столь... откровенно?"
"This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."
languages.original_text: "Я впервые слышу, чтобы ты говорил столь... откровенно?"

traits.locale_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."
"This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."
"This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."
"This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."

languages.text: “这还是我第一次听到你如此……坦诚。”
languages.original_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."

traits.locale_text: “这还是我第一次听到你如此……坦诚。”

languages.text: «Esta es la primera vez que te oigo hablar con tanta... franqueza».
languages.original_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."

traits.locale_text: «Esta es la primera vez que te oigo hablar con tanta... franqueza».

languages.text: « C'est la première fois que je vous entends vous exprimer de manière aussi... sincère. »
languages.original_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."

traits.locale_text: « C'est la première fois que je vous entends vous exprimer de manière aussi... sincère. »

languages.text: "Das ist das erste Mal, dass Ihr so ... offen mit mir sprecht."
languages.original_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist das erste Mal, dass Ihr so ... offen mit mir sprecht."

languages.text: 「こんなにも…包み隠さずに話を聞いたのは初めてだ」
languages.original_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."

traits.locale_text: 「こんなにも…包み隠さずに話を聞いたのは初めてだ」

languages.original_text: "This is the first time I have heard you speak so... openly."
